panels.description: SQL queries ranked by total time.

targets.rawSql:
WITH query_stats AS (
  SELECT
    LEFT(query, 10000) AS query,
    (total_plan_time + total_exec_time) AS total_time,
    (mean_plan_time + mean_exec_time) AS average_time,
    (max_plan_time + max_exec_time) AS max_time,
    calls
  FROM
    pg_stat_statements
  WHERE
    calls > 0
)
SELECT
  query,
  total_time,
  average_time,
  max_time,
  calls,
  total_time / (SELECT SUM(total_time) FROM query_stats) AS total_percent
FROM
  query_stats
ORDER BY
  total_time DESC
LIMIT 100;

panels.title: Query Performance

panels.description: Index hit rate. Higher is better.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    relname AS table,
    indexrelname AS index,
    (idx_blks_hit * 100) / (CASE WHEN idx_blks_hit + idx_blks_read = 0 THEN 1 ELSE idx_blks_hit + idx_blks_read END) as percentage_used
FROM 
    pg_statio_user_indexes
WHERE 
    schemaname = 'public'
ORDER BY
    percentage_used DESC;

panels.title: Index Uses

panels.description: Size of database tables.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  c.relname AS table,
  pg_table_size(c.oid) AS size
FROM
  pg_class c
  LEFT JOIN pg_namespace n ON (n.oid = c.relnamespace)
WHERE
  n.nspname NOT IN ('pg_catalog', 'information_schema')
  AND n.nspname !~ '^pg_toast'
  AND c.relkind IN ('r', 'm')
ORDER BY
  pg_table_size(c.oid) DESC;

panels.title: Table Size

panels.description: Size of all indexes in the database.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  c.relname AS name,
  sum(c.relpages :: bigint * 8192) :: bigint AS size
FROM
  pg_class c
  LEFT JOIN pg_namespace n ON (n.oid = c.relnamespace)
WHERE
  n.nspname NOT IN ('pg_catalog', 'information_schema')
  AND n.nspname !~ '^pg_toast'
  AND c.relkind = 'i'
GROUP BY
  (n.nspname, c.relname)
ORDER BY
  sum(c.relpages) DESC;

panels.title: Index Size

panels.description: Indexes that are not used or very rarely used.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  relname AS table,
  indexrelname AS index,
  pg_relation_size(i.indexrelid) AS index_size,
  idx_scan as index_scans
FROM
  pg_stat_user_indexes ui
  JOIN pg_index i ON ui.indexrelid = i.indexrelid
WHERE
  NOT indisunique
  AND idx_scan < 50
  AND pg_relation_size(relid) > 5 * 8192
ORDER BY
  pg_relation_size(i.indexrelid) / nullif(idx_scan, 0) DESC NULLS FIRST,
  pg_relation_size(i.indexrelid) DESC;

panels.title: Unused Indexes
